engine.rendering.opengl

Class OpenGLDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.rendering.opengl.OpenGLDisplay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDisplay

    public class OpenGLDisplay
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDisplay
    A display that is capable of recieving OpenGL rendering.
    Author:
    Benny Bobaganoosh (thebennybox@gmail.com)

      • OpenGLDisplay

        public OpenGLDisplay(int width,
             int height,
             java.lang.String title)
        Creates a new OpenGL display.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the display, in pixels.
        height - The height of the display, in pixels.
        title - The text appearing in the display's title bar.
